titles.title: A bill to repeal increases made by the Revenue Act of 1987 in the occupational taxes on dealers in beer, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/26/1988--Introduced. Repeals provisions of the Revenue Act of 1987 that: (1) imposed an occupational tax on proprietors of distilled spirits plants, bonded wine cellars or warehouses, and tax-paid wine bottling houses; and (2) increased the occupational taxes on brewers, both wholesale and retail dealers in liquors and beer, manufacturers of tobacco products, export warehouse proprietors, and both importers and manufacturers of firearms.
